phrs.translation: 清澈, 透明, 果真

sentences.sentence: A beauty, in silence but touch your heart faintly, vogue and elegance between limpidness of glass and brightness of metal, finally become an indispensable part of unvarying beauty.
sentences.translation: 有一种美在无声之间，幽幽撩动你的心田，将时尚和优雅归结于玻璃的清澈与金属的明亮之间，成为恒久之美不可或缺的一部分。
